```{r}
library(DESeq2)
library(ggplot2)
library(pheatmap)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(EnhancedVolcano)

png("Volcano_plot.png", width = 700, height = 600)
EnhancedVolcano(res,
                lab = rownames(res),
                x = "log2FoldChange",
                y = "padj",
                pCutoff = 0.05,
                FCcutoff = 1,
                title = "AgXX vs Control")
dev.off()
```
